activity_description: Large Japanese garden with beautiful Japanese landscaping, tranquil ponds, and a traditional tea house. Nice, serene escape from the city.
Beautiful rose gardens with over 10,000 rose bushes representing more than 650 varieties. Great views of Portland and Mount Hood. Roses are in bloom late May through October.
Casual counter-service restaurant that specializes in Southern Thai food including fried chicken, curry, and roti. Fun cocktails. No reservations.
